entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Fog spreading inland in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
